upgradeHeading: Hey buddy! Here's what we can upgrade ASAP!
upgradeText:
STR - :cannister: **1**
```Permanently upgrades your Strength by 1, so you can hit them Ravagers harder.```
SPD - :cannister: **1**
```Permanently upgrades your Speed by 1, so you can get hit less in battle.```
STAM - :cannister: **1**
```Permanently upgrades your Max Stamina by 1, so you can hit more Ravagers.```
HP - :cannister: **1**
```Permanently upgrades your Max HP by 10, so you can can take those beatings like a champ.```
noResult: I have no idea what you just said.
